titles.title: Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Ronald J. Wright.
Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Ronald J. Wright.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution mourns the death of Representative Ronald J. Wright and requests that a copy of this resolution be transmitted to the family of the Representative.
